name: Sea Orchestra
description:
Sea Orchestra is a short relaxing game created in Unity.
Collect experiences and explore the beautiful underwater world.

The game was created as an prototype simulation for Mesh Deformation package which is published and released on the Unity Asset Store.

The interesting fact is, that the all animations in the game are generated by shaders. Beautiful volumetric fog makes the game atmosphere even better. The game was inspired by ABZU and the beautiful soundtrack called 'Their Waters Were Mingled Togethe' plays in the background during the gameplay.

Available for Windows, OSX and Linux.
